thread.title: Actor Bill Paxton dies at 61 from complications after surgery | Toronto Star
thread.title_full: Actor Bill Paxton dies at 61 from complications after surgery | Toronto Star

author: Star Staff
title: Actor Bill Paxton dies at 61 from complications after surgery | Toronto Star
text:
American actor Bill Paxton has died following complications after surgery, U.S. media are reporting. The star of Titanic , Apollo 13 and Twister was 61.
“It is with heavy hearts we share the news that Bill Paxton has passed away due to complications from surgery,” a family representative said in a statement on Sunday. 
Paxton had an “illustrious career spanning four decades as a beloved and prolific actor and filmmaker,” the family adds.
More to come. 
Article Continued Below Bill Paxton, left, Tom Hanks and Kevin Bacon star as the crew of an ill-fated lunar mission in "Apollo 13."
